description.value: Sivv engineers inspired by a species enslaved by the sivv designed this augmentation, which consists of enchanted brass wings integrated into the subjectâ€™s spine. While the wings have an impressive wingspan when in use, they fold up neatly and can be hidden under loose clothing. When in use, wing extensions grant you a fly speed of 60 feet with average maneuverability. They do not function in a @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.SfkuzH5kxSAmG4nv.JournalEntryPage.NOrSFYXShdxot60k#thin]{thin atmosphere} or @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.SfkuzH5kxSAmG4nv.JournalEntryPage.BWuAh3NeW0Dcnjon#vacuum]{vacuum}, and can be used for up to 1 hour per day, in 10-minute increments. Mk 2 wing extensions function in thin atmospheres and vacuum, and include enchantments that allow you to ignore the hazardous environmental effects of outer space and vacuum.

duration.value: Up to 1 hour per day, in 10-minute increments
